metadata.synopsis: Karlach tells the player that if the tieflings are in HAV Dammon might be there too after Mol appears in the checkpoint dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Load SCL_Main_A.2. Have Karlach in your party.3. In the debug book set up the tiefling path.4. goto -8; 28; 1194.5. If in editor: oe havchec5.  Go through the checkpoint dialog, it should trigger after it if Karlach is near and available.

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: Hey! Dammon might be knocking around here, right?

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Hey, that weaponsmith you mentioned might be here, right?
